name: Firefox icon matches between Walker and workspace bar (T012)
description: Launch Firefox and verify workspace bar shows same icon that Walker would show
notes: This test verifies User Story 1: Icon consistency between Walker and workspace bar
Firefox should appear on workspace 3 (configured in application-registry.json)
Icon path should be resolved from app registry (same as Walker)
To manually verify icon: Launch Walker (Meta+D), type 'firefox', note the icon
Then check workspace bar - icon should be identical
